name: A Day in the Life of Maria
name_original: A Day in the Life of Maria
description:
A Day in the Life of Maria is a spin-off game of successful otome visual novel The Bell Chimes For Gold.
The game explores a single day in the life of protagonist Maria Scissorland, which she spends with one of five male companions. It features a streamlined version of The Bell Chimes For Gold's gameplay, with dungeon-crawling and crafting mechanics complementing the main visual novel gameplay.
We strongly recommend that you experience The Bell Chimes For Gold first in order to get the most out of A Day in the Life of Maria, but there's still something to enjoy for everyone!


Characters:

Samuel Double
An alcoholic swordsman. He used to be a great warrior but now he just drinks the day away, putting even his sword in pawn.


William Bloom
A naive elf that is popular with women. He loves helping people and gets cheated into a lot of unintended debts.


Ben Koo A thief who is crazy about gambling. He loves gambling, but hasn’t won a single time. His skills as a thief are top notch, though.


Brian Starly A priest and warrior from a declining line of aristocrats. He struggles to get back the house his father lost. He is very snobbish and extremely selfish.


Walter Pleasant A necromancer obsessed with his studies. He is not interested in the Living and spends most of his time looking for corpses in graveyards. He is a real pervert who needs a lot of attention.


Maria Scissorland
A very ordinary but very attractive girl. Maria is very quiet and introverted but at the same time she is courageous, frugal, and kind. She is generally very prudish, but in romantic situations she lets her sexiness go wild. Maria is not special. She is a very ordinary girl, just like you.
